quick_rallypoint_mode: Način za hitro nastavitev zbirnih točk
tacnuke_and_emp: Taktična jedrska, Električna in Inferno raketa
fac_modifier_keys_instruction:
Shift+klik: pomnoženo x5.
Ctrl+klik: pomnoženo x20.
Alt+klik: Dodaj enoto na začetek navodil.
Desni klik: Odstrani (1, 5, 20) enot iz navodil.
pw_instruction_who_pvp_defender: You are defending the %{defender} planet %{planet} from %{attacker}. The attackers have %{ip} of the %{needed} influence required to conquer this planet.
pw_instruction_who_pvp_attacker: You are attacking the %{defender} planet %{planet} and have %{ip} of the %{needed} influence required to conquer this planet.
pw_instruction_who_pvp_spec: The %{defender} planet %{planet} is being invaded by %{attacker}, who has %{ip} of the %{needed} influence required to conquer this planet.
pw_instruction_who_neutral_defender: You are defending the neutral planet %{planet} from %{attacker}. The attackers have %{ip} of the %{needed} influence required to conquer this planet.
pw_instruction_who_neutral_attacker: You are attacking the neutral planet %{planet} and have %{ip} of the %{needed} influence required to conquer this planet.
pw_instruction_who_neutral_spec: The neutral planet %{planet} is being invaded by %{attacker}, who has %{ip} of the %{needed} influence required to conquer this planet.
pw_instruction_ip_defender:
If you win with your Command Center intact, %{attacker} will gain %{def_kept_cc} influence.

Protect your Command Center as, if you win without it, the enemy will gain %{def_lost_cc} influence.

If you lose, %{attacker} will gain %{att_kept_cc} influence (%{base} base + %{dropships} from dropships - %{defense} from defence).

If you are losing, try to kill the enemy Command Center, as they will only gain %{att_lost_cc} influence from victory.
pw_instruction_ip_attacker:
If you win with your Command Center intact, you will gain %{att_kept_cc} influence (%{base} base + %{dropships} from dropships - %{defense} from defence).

Protect your Command Center as, if you win without it, you will only gain %{att_lost_cc} influence.

If you are losing, try to kill enemy Command Center as destroying it gains you %{def_lost_cc} influence in defeat.

If you are defeated without destroying the enemy Command Center you will gain %{def_kept_cc} influence.
pw_instruction_ip_spec:
%{defender} victory results in %{def_kept_cc} influence for %{attacker} if %{defender} Command Center survived, else %{def_lost_cc}.

%{attacker} victory results in %{att_lost_cc} influence if the Command Center was destroyed, else the full %{att_kept_cc} (%{base} base + %{dropships} from dropships - %{defense} from defence).
pw_instruction_buildings_defender:
Protect your planetary infrastructure as any structures destroyed here will be disabled on the strategic map.
Active wormhole generators allow you to periodically evacuate structures to safety.
Hold out if you are losing as all remaining structures will be destroyed upon defeat.
Do not destroy your own in anticipation of a loss as all structures are automatically disabled on newly conquered planets.
pw_instruction_buildings_attacker:
Destroy the planetary infrastructure as any structures destroyed here will be disabled on the strategic map.
Destroy key structures first as the defenders may evacuate them.
There is no need to delay victory as, if you win, all remaining structures are automatically destroyed.
toggle_evacuation_desc: Shows metagame structures' status and provides evacuation interface.
toggle_pw_instructions_desc: Shows instructions for current planetary battle.
toggle_attrition_counter_desc: Counts unit losses and thence calculates attrition effectiveness.
toggle_mission_objectives_name: Preklopi prikaz ciljev za to misijo.
toggle_mission_objectives_desc: Prikaže glavne in stranske cilje trenutne misije.
toggle_eco_display_desc: Prikaže nahajališča kovine, vroče vode in energijsko omrežje.
toggle_cheatsheet_desc: Prikaže tabelo s kratkimi uporabnimi goljufijami.
place_retreat_zone_desc:
Označi območje za umik ali klikni na že obstoječa območja, da jih odstraniš.
Drži Shift, če hočeš označiti več območij.
place_ferry_route_desc: Drži Shift, da dodajaš ali popravljaš orientacijske točke na transportni poti. Klikni na začetek poti, da pot odstraniš.
clearmapmarks_desc: Izbriše vse risbe in oznake na zemljevidu (samo za tebe, ne za vse)
lastmsgpos_desc: Premakne vidno polje na zadnjo oznako na zadnjo oznako na zemljevidu.
viewstandard_desc: Izključi vse dodatne plasti: reliefna, plast poti in plast vidnih polij.
viewheightmap_name: Preklopi prikaz plasti z višinskimi barvnimi pasovi
viewblockmap_desc: Izberi enoto, da vidiš, kam se lahko premakne. Izberi stavbo v meniju za grajenje, da vidiš, kam jo lahko postaviš.
viewfow_desc: Prikaže ali skrije vidno polje tvojih enot in območje delovanja radarja.
teamcolor_selector: Izberi način prikazovanja barv igralcev in ekip. Možnosti vključujejo preprosti način in način za barvno slepe.
cheatsheet_btn_spawn: Ustvari enote na točki, ki si jo izbereš.
cheatsheet_btn_gk: Ubij vse enote. Za njimi ostanejo razbitine.
cheatsheet_btn_clear: Odstrani vse enote in ostale predmete na zemljevidu.
cheatsheet_btn_rez: Oživi razbitine in jih daj njihovim lastnikom.
cheatsheet_chb_godmode_desc: Omogoči gledalcem, da kontrolirajo vse enote.
cheatsheet_chb_allowfps_desc: Dovoli uporabo prvoosebnega načina, tudi če je uporaba goljufij izklopljena. Izberi enoto in pritisni Alt+P, da preklopiš na prvoosebni način.
cheatsheet_chb_nocost_desc: Enote in zgradbe se zgradijo zastonj in skoraj takoj.
cheatsheet_chb_globallos_desc: Get line of sight over the entire map.
cheatsheet_chb_cheat_desc:
Enables unit spawning and the use of the other options below. Note that each cheat stays enabled even if the ability to toggle them is disabled.
Cheats be toggled in any game with '/cheat' in singleplayer or with '!hostsay /cheat' in multiplayer.
replay_controls_skip_pregame_tooltip: Skip the pregame and go directly to the action!
startup_commenu_sitelink: You can customise your commanders for use in multiplayer on the Zero-K site: https://zero-k.info
startup_commenu_guardian_desc: A slow tanky chassis with a wide range of weapons and inbuilt battle drones. Can dual wield and gains 25%% extra health from armour modules.
startup_commenu_recon_desc: A nimble chassis that uses speed and jumpjets to explore the map and avoid opposition. Gains bonus speed and jump cooldown from speed modules. Otherwise has poor survivability and lower build power.
startup_commenu_strike_desc: An all-round chassis with good speed and health. Can dual wield and gains extra health regeneration with levels.
startup_commenu_engineer_desc: A chassis focused on economy that uses its high build range and base build power to increase production. It has relatively poor speed and health.
